name: Knight Minder
description:
⚔️ Story

Main hero, powerful sorceress Isabel, tragically lost her husband during a war with invaders from the mystical machinery kingdom, a previously unknown 13th world.

However, she found out that the invaders have a mechanism that brings the dead back to life. Trying to find a way to one of the invaders’ flying ships Isabel is being caught and put in the deepest prison of invaders’ royal castle.

That's how our story begins...

⚔️ Gameplay

You will join a reckless and aggressive knight Terran during your prison break. Coping alone without Terran is difficult, so Isabel definitely needs his help.

Together you have to pass various dungeons with different puzzles and obstacles.

Terran often falls into traps and recklessly attacks groups of opponents, so Isabel needs to intensively support him by Healing and Pushing. (In the full version of the game there will be more interactions with the knight)

⚔️ About

This demo was in development for roughly 5 months as a course project for ITMO University's game development master program. There are 4 people in a team.

We are planning to continue develop the game, so your feedback is very valuable for us!

♡ Thank you for playing and stay tuned for futher updates ♡
